owner.name: Fazle Rabbi Zaki
owner.title: Aerospace Engineer
owner.tagline: Controls, sensing, and hardware testing. I build, test, and verify.
owner.about: I design and test flight-like systems at small scale. I like clean interfaces, repeatable tests, and simple models backed by data.
aboutBullets: Controls and sensing for small platforms (ADCS, IMU fusion)
Hardware bring-up, test jigs, and data analysis

projects.title: Autonomous ADCS Imaging Testbed (CubeSat scale, 1U)
projects.summary: Built a flight-like 1U observation platform under 1 kg integrating compute/power, structure, IMU, magnetometer, star/IR/science cameras, and actuators (reaction wheel + magnetorquers) to autonomously detumble, point, and image.
methods: TRIAD + EKF estimation with sensor fusion
B-dot detumble, PID/LQR pointing, momentum management
verification: Closed-loop pointing and wheel desaturation validated
Mode transitions logged via ground station

projects.title: Air Puck Prototype for Titan
projects.summary: Hexagonal air-puck optimized for fast traverse and payload. CATIA + STAR-CCM+, Arduino control.

projects.title: Hovercraft Prototype
projects.role: Mechanical and Electrical Design and Test
projects.summary: Designed and built a Milano-shaped RC hovercraft under NASA constraints (under 800 g, 55×55×22 cm); delivered a 490.62 g system with servo-driven thrust vectoring and 3D-printed inlet motor mount.
metrics: CFD: 4.22 N lift at 2 m/s, Cd = 1.09
verification: Added skirt with open trailing edge
Removed rear wall for improved lift/control
Validated on rugs and competition courses

projects.title: Wind-Powered Generator – HAWT Prototype
projects.summary: Built a self-yawing horizontal-axis wind turbine using accessible wood, PVC, and 3D-printed parts; three 80 cm blades; turntable yaw bearing with vane; trap-door hub for maintenance; delivered within $110 budget.
metrics: TSR avg 2.5 (max 7.2), power 0.10–0.17 W, max 6.45 V
verification: Passed 5 rooftop safety checks (300 N lateral load)
High-wind disassembly, passerby test, roof integrity
